sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SignUp } from './sign-up'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'BreadBasket'; isAddUser = false; addUser(user: SignUp) { this.isAddUser = false; } addNewUser(user: SignUp ){ this.isAddUser = true; } }
